title: Banned
body: when I log in it says I was banned? Is it because I never verified an email?

replies.body: It looks like there was some possible suspicious activity happening on your account, so a temporary suspension was put in place to make sure your account was kept safe. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the subject "I need help recovering my account" and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
